name: A Nightmare In A Maze
description:
A small learning exercise in path-finding, which grew into a small horror maze game. If you'd like to read more about the process of this project and my own reflections, you can read more about it at my website.

INSTRUCTIONS: 

Find all four keys within the maze, and escape through the door in the heart of the maze.

CONTROLS:

  • WASD - Move
  • MOUSE - Look
  • SHIFT - Run
  • TAB - Open/Close Inventory
  • E - Interact 
  • RIGHT CLICK - Use item while equipped/equip item (WHILE IN INVENTORY)
  • LEFT CLICK - Unequipped item (returns it to inventory)
